content: description the windfall cardigan is worked in one large piece from side to side with minimal seaming and a fun stitch repeat you ll have it worked up in no time the windfall cardigan pattern is free on my blog 1 the windfall cardigan is a kit on lion brand 2 the kit includes all the yarn needed to make the cardigan + the pdf digital download you can even customize your yarn color choices prefer a visual the video tutorial for this pattern 3 is available on my youtube channel 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-windfall-cardigan-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //shrsl com/306nb 3 https //youtu be/eatksicq2vc
